channel.title: Fixing lag
channel.description: i was just wondering how the heck do you fix lag on a server??? because my server is super laggy and its really annoying so please if you no post and if it works ill rep you.

item.title: Fixing lag
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:11, topic:321071”]Umm Windows XP’s are excellent to use for servers…
if you have the money buy a xp… if you don’t create a server from testscape xD
gotta love testscape <3[/quote]

Rofl, not true…I have Windows 7 64-bit OS and I can run a server just fine…All it takes is an extra program to save the castle of editting the batch files but it’s not a problem as it works…I just think that he should learn to host it himself or just get a new hoster.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing lag
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

A server can lagg when you have many portals in one spot or too many things going on in one spot.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing lag
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

frozon566:

i have a exact copy of the server that i just ran and tested and there wasnt any lag so im guessing t is my hoster, but i dont wana change my hoster cus hes my good friend so wut can i tell him on how to fix it?

Tell him to get a new computer…If he disagrees as I would if I was told to get a new computer because I fail at hosting I’d just stop…So get a new hoster or GF to your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing lag
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

i have a exact copy of the server that i just ran and tested and there wasnt any lag so im guessing t is my hoster, but i dont wana change my hoster cus hes my good friend so wut can i tell him on how to fix it?

item.title: Fixing lag
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

frozon566:

well how can he fix the lag because like im not the hoster of real runescape but i lag on rs sometimes so wut do you do to fix the lag instead of running from it?

If you are not a member on Runescape then it’s probably the advertisements changing causing the lagg, I had the problem when I playing RS, if not then it’s probably just a small lagg spike.

But the lagg from your server is most likely to be your hoster…As I have said above test out a new hoster and see if the lagg is still there.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

frozon566:

so its my cp? also im not the hoster, but is it my computer?

Hmm, I suggest that you test out another hoster, see if the lagg has gone…It’s probably your hoster. I thought you was the hoster so I said your comp. xD My appologies.
